stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Dream-Weaving Spells for Greater Inspiration!
stories.fantasy_story: At the Grand Academy of Arcana, wise wizards have uncovered a way to guide dreamers. By playing gentle magical melodies during deep slumber, they can plant seeds of thought. This enchanting new method helps people awaken with brilliant, creative ideas for solving their daily woes.
